cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This website uses cookies to enhance the user experience and collect anonymous statistics.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on the user's device by the website to save browsing information.

whatCookiesWeUse.title: What cookies do we use?
whatCookiesWeUse.basicCookie: Essential cookies – These are necessary for the technical functioning of the site.
whatCookiesWeUse.analyticsCookie: Analytical cookies (Google Analytics) – These help us understand how visitors use the website (e.g., number of page views, time spent).

managingCookies.title: How can you manage cookies?
managingCookies.content: Most browsers allow you to disable or delete cookies. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the website.
